subject: Implement Phase 10: Advanced Visualizations Module
body:
Add comprehensive visualization capabilities for inter-company transaction analysis:

10.1 Cross-Model Comparison Charts:
- Model comparison summary table with side-by-side metrics
- Combined asset position by model (stacked bar chart)
- Total cost to buyer ranked comparison
- Developer return comparison across all 6 models
- Risk score comparison radar chart

10.2 Timeline Visualizations:
- Asset value over time with amortisation trajectories
- Cash flow waterfall showing transaction components
- Multi-entity amortisation schedule (accounting vs S11e tax)
- Project phase Gantt chart for development timeline

10.3 Risk Visualizations:
- Transfer pricing risk heat map by factor
- Risk vs return quadrant chart (scatter plot)
- Compliance score gauge (radial bar)
- Sensitivity tornado chart (Stage 2 preparation)

Integration:
- Added tabbed interface (Calculator, Compliance, Visualizations)
- Integrated with existing ApexCharts library
- Full dark theme support
- Dynamic data generation from calculation results
title: Implement Phase 10: Advanced Visualizations Module
